summary: Created /lean command with skill-lean-version for Lean toolchain and Mathlib version management. Provides 4 modes: check (status display), upgrade (interactive with AskUserQuestion and backup), rollback (restore from backup), and dry-run (preview changes). Complements existing /lake command.

artifacts.summary: Command entry point with syntax, options, mode routing, and examples
Direct execution skill with check, upgrade, rollback, and dry-run modes
Implementation summary with phase log and verification checklist

completion_data.completion_summary: Created /lean command with skill-lean-version for Lean toolchain and Mathlib version management. Command provides check, upgrade, rollback, and dry-run modes with backup support and AskUserQuestion for interactive confirmation.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added /lean to command list in CLAUDE.md, created .claude/commands/lean.md and .claude/skills/skill-lean-version/SKILL.md

next_steps: Test /lean command with check mode on current project
